description: A modulo two based Pascal's triangle using powers of two for even and powers of three for odd: t(n,m)=If[Mod[Binomial[n, m], 2] == 0 && m <= Floor[n/2], 2^m, If[Mod[Binomial[n, m], 2] == 0 && m > Floor[n/2], 2^(n - m), If[Mod[Binomial[n, m], 2] == 1 && m <= Floor[n/2], 3^m, If[Mod[Binomial[n, m], 2] == 1 && m > Floor[n/2], 3^(n - m), 0]]]].
